content: the fall crown headband features two mirrored lace columns separated by slipped stitches on a reverse stockinette background the headband is knitted flat the pattern is a 4-row repeat the first and last 3 stitches form an i-cord edging that makes the edges look neat and prevents them from curling the cast-on and bind-off edges are seamed together forming a decorative twist in the middle the seam is hidden by the twist and is not visible
